item.title: Shape Republic
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary.The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words. If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the resulting language is more simple and regular than that of the individual languages.The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental. Copyright: Studio Oeding.

Take full control of the power Creativohas to offer with our new exciting page builder. Youll be grinning in delight when you see just how easy it is to create stunning layouts with little effort.

Creativo is packing more than 70 visual elements that can be used to create the perfect website for you and your clients. From blog post, portfolio showcase, to Team Memeber elements, Creativo has everything you need.

From Design to Development, everything is done with simple mouse clicks - it's no wonder Creativo is being used by over 11,000+ satisfied cusomers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498220048684{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;background-color: #fafafa !important;border-top-color: #ededed !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ededed !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_tabs color="custom" tt_font_size="16px" tt_font_weight="400" tc_font_size="14px" tc_line_heigt="26px" style="style_5"][vc_tab title="Web Design" tab_id="c043b05d-7783-10"][vc_column_text 0=""]The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental. To an English person, it will seem like simplified English, as a skeptical Cambridge friend of mine told me what Occidental is. The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][vc_tab title="Development" tab_id="331c1658-7dfd-2"][vc_column_text 0=""]The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][/vc_tabs][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1498220124524{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"][vc_toggle title="How to purchase Creativo " size="sm" el_id="1498217103734-73a0088b-c772"]Creativo can be purchased on the MojoMarketplace website only. The them costs only $59, one time fee only.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How can I receive support?" size="sm" el_id="1498217332639-c728ed2a-94be"]Support is provided by us RockyThemes via Chat, Forum or directly by email. Head to the Contact area to get in touch with us.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can the theme be customized?" size="sm" el_id="1498217330304-4e9effb8-246b"]Yes, Creativo allows you to change every single pixel on your site. item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Youtube / Vimeo / SoundCloud
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row layout="normal" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="20" paddingbottom="0" bg_color="#ffffff" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8"][vc_column width="1/1"][ctitle title="Embedding Media" color="#666666" background="#ffffff" uppercase="yes" font_size="14" font_weight="700" position="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row layout="normal" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="0" paddingbottom="40" bg_color="#ffffff" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]
Youtube Videos
By using Visual Composer Video element you can easily integrate any Youtube video directly on your webpage. All you need is the link of the youtube video, and youre ready to go.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_video link="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wq4Y7ztznKc"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]
Vimeo Videos
By using Visual Composer Video element you can easily integrate any Vimeo video directly on your webpage. All you need is the link of the vimeo video, and youre ready to go.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/10145153"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]
Soundcloud
By using Visual Composer Video element you can easily integrate any Soundloud audio track directly on your webpage. All you need is the link of the audio track link, and youre ready to go.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_video link="https://soundcloud.com/timberlakejustin/justin-timberlake-npr"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row layout="normal" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="0" paddingbottom="40" bg_color="#ffffff" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
More about supported formats atWordPress codex page.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Highlighting important text!
Ever wanted to highlight some important content for your visitors? Well now you can: using thehighlight shortcode. 7 color styles are already available but you if have better ideas you can create your own highlight color using Creativo's theme options. Let's go ahead and show you what we created so far: [divider style="double" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="20"][/divider] Donec nibh mauris, pharetra ut lobortis a, mattis vel ligula. item.title: Dropcaps
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row layout="normal" parallax="" video_bg="" mp4="" webm="" video_overlay="rgba(0,0,0,0.45)" video_placeholder="" section_id="" fullscreen="" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="30" paddingbottom="0" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8" css=".vc_custom_1425245738740{padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][ctitle title="Dropcaps" uppercase="yes" color="#666666" background="#ffffff" font_size="14" font_weight="700" position="center" separator_color="#ebebeb" el_width=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row layout="normal" parallax="" video_bg="" video_overlay="rgba(0,0,0,0.45)" fullscreen="" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="0" paddingbottom="40" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8" css=".vc_custom_1433287455426{padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation=""]

Dropcaps Shortcode

We have created our own dropcap shortcode, allowing you to control the size, style, color and background of your dropcap. Choose between 7 colors for the dropcap font color and 7 colors for the background of the dropcap. How you combine these colors is up to you. Besides the color and the background you can also choose the size (big or small) and the style of the dropcap: rounded, rectangle or circle. You can see the examples bellow: [divider style="double" padding_top="15" padding_bottom="15"][/divider]

Dropcaps having abackground, font color,roundedshape andbigsize!

[dropcap color="white" background="green" style="rounded" size="big"]U[/dropcap]t nunc odio, dignissim in fringilla vitae, sagittis id ante. Vestibulum at quam sem. Nulla facilisi. Phasellus in congue libero. Proin pulvinar, turpis ac molestie tincidunt, nunc leo facilisis orci, ac tempor dolor tortor quis massa. Aliquam sit amet elit purus, ultricies tempus est. Nullam tortor erat, consequat in congue quis, vestibulum sagittis ligula. Mauris quis dapibus nunc. Suspendisse molestie blandit dignissim. Ut non neque id lacus egestas commodo et id justo. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Sed at velit sed sapien feugiat luctus. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. [dropcap color="white" background="red" style="rectangle" size="big"]D[/dropcap]in et eros eget velit placerat posuere quis sit amet erat. Vivamus varius tincidunt nisi quis fermentum. Proin accumsan, justo at dapibus tristique, felis arcu aliquam magna, ac lacinia mi quam sed orci. Donec blandit arcu eget enim hendrerit ut egestas nisl bibendum. Curabitur fringilla adipiscing lacinia. Maecenas luctus ultricies felis, vitae vulputate quam elementum ac. Fusce interdum porttitor justo, eu adipiscing turpis lobortis varius. item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="20" paddingbottom="0" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8" css=".vc_custom_1451763184728{padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][ctitle title="Carousel Testimonials" color="#444444" background="#ffffff" font_size="20" font_weight="700"][vc_column_text]

Use the Testimonials element of Visual Composer to display testimonials from your clients. Before using this element, at least one Testimonial must be created by going to your WordPress admin dashboard -> Testimonials -> Add New.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="0" paddingbottom="40" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8" css=".vc_custom_1451764003557{padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_testimonials items="10" timeout="3000" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][vc_testimonials items="10" visible_items="2" timeout="4000" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][vc_testimonials items="10" visible_items="3" timeout="4500" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1451764114621{padding-top: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][ctitle title="Grid Testimonials" color="#444444" background="#ffffff" font_size="20" font_weight="700"][vc_column_text]

Each Testimonial element can be displayed in a Carousel style or Grid style. There are also options to change the image alignment, font face, font size, etc. See more examples and alterations of the Testimonials element below:

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="30" padding_bottom="30"][vc_testimonials items="6" test_style="left" type="grid" cols="cols-2" font_style="italic" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][ctitle title="3 Columns Grid Testimonial" color="#444444" background="#ffffff" font_size="20" font_weight="700"][vc_column_text]

3 Columns Testimonials with Image alignment to the left.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][vc_testimonials items="6" test_style="left" type="grid" cols="cols-3" font_size="13" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][ctitle title="4 Columns Grid Testimonial" color="#444444" background="#ffffff" font_size="20" font_weight="700"][vc_column_text]

3 Columns Testimonials with Image alignment on Center.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][vc_testimonials items="8" type="grid" cols="cols-4" font_size="13" author_font_size="14" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][ctitle title="1 Columns Grid Testimonial" color="#444444" background="#ffffff" font_size="20" font_weight="700"][vc_testimonials items="6" test_style="left" type="grid" font_style="italic" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][ctitle title="Testimonials without Images " color="#444444" background="#ffffff" font_size="20" font_weight="700"][vc_column_text]

Images Disabled and custom styling enabled. Color changed for testimonial description, link and author name. More options available to change: font size, font weight, font style, etc.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][vc_testimonials items="6" test_style="left" test_images="no" type="grid" cols="cols-3" style="custom" custom_color="#00603e" testimonial_author="#0a0000" testimonial_link="#b7b7b7" font_style="italic" font_weight="400" author_font_weight="600" include=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

For Bloggers

With Creativo you can build any type of website you want, no coding needed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="3650" img_size="" alignment="center"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1498479590822{padding-top: 20px !important;}"]

For Start-ups

With Creativo you can build any type of website you want, no coding needed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="3652" img_size="" alignment="center"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1498479634228{padding-top: 20px !important;}"]

For Freelancers

With Creativo you can build any type of website you want, no coding needed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498480500212{padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1498480428360{border-top-width: 3px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;border-top-color: #4a90e2 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}"][tagline_box call_text="Creativo is the Ultimate Multi Purpose Theme!" call_text_small="Packing all the latest technologies of the moment: premium sliders, fully responsive, drag and drop builder, advanced theme options and more!" title="Download Now" target="_blank" color="custom" custom_bg_color="#fafafa" custom_inner_padding="30px" custom_title_font_size="26px" custom_description_color="#6d6d6d" custom_description_font_size="16px" custom_description_line_height="28px" button_align="middle" button_border_color="#4a90e2" button_bg_color="#4a90e2" href="https://www.mojomarketplace.com/item/creativo-5-0-ultra-responsive-multipurpose-wp-theme"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498480900445{padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title="How to purchase Creativo ?"][vc_column_text]Creativo can be purchased on the MojoMarketplace website only. The them costs only $59, one time fee only.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I receive support ?"][vc_column_text]Support is provided by us RockyThemes via Chat, Forum or directly by email. Head to the Contact area to get in touch with us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can the theme be customized ?"][vc_column_text]Yes, Creativo allows you to change every single pixel on your site. Everything is done with simple mouse clicks.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can I change the Copyright text?"][vc_column_text]Yes, you can change every text with your own content, including the Copyright section of the theme. Simply go to Appearance -> Theme Options -> Footer -> Footer Copyright and change it there.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I update Creativo?"][vc_column_text]The theme can be updated with just one click by going to Appearance -> Themes page. Click once and the theme will be automatically updated.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tabs color="custom" tt_font_size="14px" custom_colored_border="#4a90e2" style="style_4"][vc_tab tab_id="310f118a-0643-2" title="Social Media"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1498482128620{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.[/vc_column_text][vc_gallery type="image_grid" images="2889,2890,2885,2891" img_size="140x100"][/vc_tab][vc_tab title="Development" tab_id="223f2752-5170-1"][vc_column_text 0=""]The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][vc_tab title="Design Studio" tab_id="f3d72fc5-745d-0"][vc_column_text]The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][vc_tab tab_id="ae24382c-a4fa-3" title="Advertising"][vc_column_text]

he languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. item.title: Latest Works Category Filter
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
[outter_wrapper title="Lates Works Category Filter by Default" background="white"]
Here's how you can show only your latest works from a specific category: simply add category="enter category id" to the recent works shortcode and you're done.
[divider style="double"][/divider]
Example 1: Filtering the Concepts category
[recent_works show_filters="no" items="8" columns="4" category="25"][/recent_works]
[divider style="double"][/divider]
Example 2: Filtering the Modelling category
[recent_works show_filters="no" items="8" columns="4" category="24"][/recent_works]
[/outter_wrapper]

Creating an awesome slider is really easy.[/vc_service_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_service_box title="Page Builder" target="_self" icon="2519" view_more="true" href="#"]Take advantage of the built in visual Page Builder to create the perfect landing pages for your business.[/vc_service_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_service_box title="Google Fonts" target="_self" icon="2520" view_more="true" href="#"]Everybody loves fonts so Creativo comes with over 500+ Google Fonts. Just select the one you like from the backend![/vc_service_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row layout="normal" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="40" paddingbottom="40" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="yes" border_color="#f2f2f2" css=".vc_custom_1425244447513{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background: #ffffff url(http://rockythemes.com/creativo/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/pattern2011.png?id=2525) !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][ctitle title="The Best Theme Ever" uppercase="yes" color="#707070" background="#f8f8f8" font_size="20" font_weight="700" position="left"][vc_column_text]Start using Creativo and improve your business today. More than 3400 customers using Creativo can't be wrong. [checklist style="green"]

FEATURED WORK

Best Selling Theme on MojoMarketplace

Our customers recommend us. We have built the best selling theme ever created on MojoMarketplace.com

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]

Automatic Updates for Life

It's easier then ever to keep your theme up to date. With just a simple click of a mouse you can update your theme to the latest version.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="50" padding_bottom="50"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Powerful, Versatile, Complete Solution

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="20" padding_bottom="20"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

One Theme, Infinite Posibilites

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row layout="normal" margintop="0" marginbottom="0" paddingtop="70" paddingbottom="50" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="no" en_border="no" border_color="#e8e8e8" css=".vc_custom_1425244013846{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_product_feature title="Drag'n Drop Page Builder" target="_self" icon="2551" view_more="true"]With more than 40 Visual Elements you can really build any type of page you want.[/vc_product_feature][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_product_feature title="Powerful Admin Options" target="_self" icon="2615" view_more="true" href="#"]With over 200 settings you have the freedom and power to customize Creativo the way you want.[/vc_product_feature][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_product_feature title="Fully Responsive Design" target="_self" icon="2548" view_more="true"]Creativo looks amazing on anymobile device. features Creativo theme has to offer." font_container="tag:h4|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416455668{padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3091" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="VISUAL COMPOSER" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Creativo is packing the best Drag&Drop Page Builder for WordPress: Visual Composer.

With Creativo and Visual Composer youwill be able to take full control of your WordPress site, and build any layout you can imagine no programming knowledge required!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3108" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="REVOLUTION SLIDER" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Creativo is integrating the best selling slider plugin for WordPress: Revolution Slider

Whether its a Slider, Carousel, Hero Scene or even a whole Front Page, the visual drag & drop editor inside Revolution Slider will let you tell your own stories in no time!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3101" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="LAYER SLIDER" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Creativo is integrating the powerful LayerSlider premium slider plugin for WordPress.

Use itfor creating image galleries, content sliders, and mind-blowing slideshows with must-see effects, even from your WordPress posts and pages.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3096" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="1 CLICK DEMO IMPORT" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
With just One Click you can import any of the available Demo on your site.

After installing the theme go to Appearance -> Import Templates and choose the Demo you want to import. Click only once and wait for the theme to do all the hard work for you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3093" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="AUTOMATIC UPDATES" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Updating Creativoto the latest versionis done directly from your WordPress Dashboard.

The update process is done automatically through your WordPress Dashboard without you having to do any extra work. Just click Update and watch how the theme does the rest.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3110" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="LIFETIME SUPPORT" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
We provide 5 Star Support for all our clients.Anything you need we can provide.

We value our customers and we are always doing everything we can to provide the best support in the business. We are here to help you with anything you need.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3111" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="POWERFUL THEME OPTIONS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
The Theme Options allows you to change everything from design to site functionality.

Access the Theme Options panel by going to Appearance -> Theme Options and start customizing your Creativo theme to best suit your needs and desires.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3107" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="ULTRA RESPONSIVE DESIGN" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Creativo looks amazing on any type of mobile devices.

Try loading our demo sites on any mobile device. You will see the content adapt accordingly to the mobile device used, the same way your site will behave when using Creativo.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3102" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="BUILT-IN MEGA MENU" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Creativo allows you to transform your normal menus in beautiful Mega Menus.

With just a few clicks you can transform any default Menu to a beautiful Mega Menu. You also have the power to control the number of columns used for the Mega Menu.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3103" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="ONE PAGE NAVIGATION" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Create amazing One Page Navigation websites with ease.

This is another native feature of Creativo which allows you to create top notch One Page Navigation Websites without writing a single line of code.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3106" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="PARALLAX EFFECT" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Impress your visitors by creating Parallax effect backgrounds.

You can assign the Parallax effect to all your pages, posts, portfolio items, etc, under the Theme Options or individually using the Visual Composer Row element settings.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3113" img_size="310x160"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="VIDEO BACKGROUNDS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
AddHTML5 Videos or Youtube Videos as Backgrounds for your Row elements.

A background image is worth 1000 words, but a Video Background will tell your story exactly how you want it. This is another basic feature using Visual Composer.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3099" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="UNLIMITED COLORS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
With Creativo you can change the Color of every existing element.

The Theme Options interface allows you to easily change the Colors of all major elements on your site. From Menus to links, you have the power to adapt everything you want.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3092" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="CUSTOM TYPOGRAPHY" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Use the Typograhpy settingsto enhance the design of your site.

Creativo allows you to useany of the existing Google Fonts but you can also upload your own custom font families, everything done with just a few clicks.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3095" img_size="310x160"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="CUSTOM BACKGROUNDS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Custom Backgrounds is another default feature for Creativo theme.

Set any background image you want for individual Row elements, your entire site or just certain pages/posts/portfolio items. No coding required at all.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3100" img_size="310x160"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="INFINITE SIDEBARS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
You have the freedomto create as many Sidebars as you desire.

If the default sidebars from Creativo are not enough for you, you can create an unlimited number of sidebars and assign them individually to your posts, pages, etc.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3112" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="TRANSLATION READY" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Need your site translated into another language? That's 100% possible.

Creativo provides the language files needed for you to translate your site into a different language.Use PoEdit or WPML plugin to translate your site into a different language.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3115" img_size="310x160"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="WOOCOMMERCE READY" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Creativo is fully compatible with the best shopping car plugin: WooCommerce

Transform your site into a powerful Shopping platform using the WooCommerce plugin. Creativo integrates a simple and beautiful design to help you with your sells.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3109" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="WIDE/BOXED LAYOUT" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
The Theme Options allows you to change the entire Site Layout with just one click.

Switch between the Boxed and Wide layout to decide which is best for you. Both layouts are fully responsive so go with any one of these two. Your visitors will be impressed.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3104" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="POWERFUL PAGE OPTIONS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Page Options can be changedindividually for each of your posts, pages, portfolios.

Each of your post, page or portfolio items can be individually customizedusing the Page Options provided. Alter the header, footer, backgrounds, page titles, etc.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3114" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="VISUAL ELEMENTS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Use the integrated Visual Composer elements to create superb pages for your site.

Each element of Visual Composer can be customized from design to functionality. Use the Front End Visual Composer option to view these changes in Real Time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1446416506403{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413944644{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3097" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="HEADER VARIATIONS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
With Creativo you can change the design of your Header with just a few clicks.

5 Custom Header options are provided for you to try and use for your site. Make sure you test all of them as each one provides a special design for your header area.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413972578{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3105" img_size="310x160" alignment="center"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="PAGE TEMPLATES" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
Use the built-inPage Templates to create different sections fast and easy.

Choose from more than 10 ready to use Page Templates to create sections for: blog, portfolio, full widthpagesandcontact pages. Each template has its own design and functionality.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1446413994395{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border: 20px solid #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3094" img_size="310x160"][vc_separator style="blank" padding_top="10" padding_bottom="10"][vc_custom_heading text="BLOG" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23444444|line_height:2" google_fonts="font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]
You can also use Creativo to create beautiful posts on your site.

If you want to keep things simple and only use Creativo as a blog theme, that's 100% possible. We already created everything you need to show your posts withstyle.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: The Guide to Becoming a Better Web Designer
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.
Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar. The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didnt listen.
She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. Pityful a rethoric question ran over her cheek, then she continued her way.
On her way she met a copy. The copy warned the Little Blind Text, that where it came from it would have been rewritten a thousand times and everything that was left from its origin would be the word "and" and the Little Blind Text should turn around and return to its own, safe country. But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didnt take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency, where they abused her for their projects again and again.
And if she hasnt been rewritten, then they are still using her. Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: How Building A Design System Can Improve Your Work
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.
Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar. The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didnt listen.
She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. Pityful a rethoric question ran over her cheek, then she continued her way.
On her way she met a copy. The copy warned the Little Blind Text, that where it came from it would have been rewritten a thousand times and everything that was left from its origin would be the word "and" and the Little Blind Text should turn around and return to its own, safe country. But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didnt take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency, where they abused her for their projects again and again.
And if she hasnt been rewritten, then they are still using her. Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One

item.title: Reiss Bluff Collar Shirt With Geo Print In Slim Fit
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT REISS British menswear label Reiss is modern and design-led, underpinned with a sense of refinement. With a philosophy centred around taking a directional lead when it comes to cutting cloth, Reiss give us their collection of signature sharp suiting and outerwear, premium wool knitwear made for layering and classic footwear with their own archetypal twist. Shirt by Reiss
  • Crisp, soft-touch fabric
  • All over print
  • Point collar
  • Button placket
  • Slim fit - cut closely to the body
  • Hand wash
  • 100% Cotton
  • Our model wears a size Medium and is 188cm/6'2" tall
ABOUT ME Body: 100% Cotton. SIZE & FIT Model's height: 6'2/188 cm Model is wearing: Size MediumLOOK AFTER MEHand Wash Only

item.title: Image Gallery Post
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.
Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar. The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didnt listen.
She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. Pityful a rethoric question ran over her cheek, then she continued her way.
On her way she met a copy. The copy warned the Little Blind Text, that where it came from it would have been rewritten a thousand times and everything that was left from its origin would be the word "and" and the Little Blind Text should turn around and return to its own, safe country. But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didnt take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency, where they abused her for their projects again and again.
And if she hasnt been rewritten, then they are still using her. Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One

item.title: Thomas Dust
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Nunc condimentum urna vel tempus rhoncus. Aliquam non ullamcorper tellus. Morbi auctor mauris vitae consequat eleifend. Integer egestas id risus eu fringilla. Sed dictum rhoncus purus, vel fringilla eros euismod posuere.

item.title: Andrew Sturidge
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Cras quis velit non lorem elementum ultricies ac eu est. Aenean erat justo, accumsan vitae sem non, tristique imperdiet mauris. Curabitur dapibus sapien id leo euismod dapibus.

item.title: Maria Jacobson
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: In dignissim, odio a tincidunt pellentesque, nibh orci auctor orci, ut vestibulum leo mauris quis nisl. Proin euismod, neque in mattis accumsan, magna erat pretium neque, eget porta mi felis vel metus.

item.title: Jake Beem
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Vivamus ullamcorper mollis mauris. Nulla facilisi. Nulla eu libero pretium, rhoncus nunc id, vestibulum lectus. Duis sed ex urna. Etiam nec pellentesque ipsum. Nunc sit amet volutpat nunc, sed dictum lacus.

item.title: Mike Milligan
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Duis quis mauris nec lectus maximus dictum sit amet id ipsum. Sed auctor placerat imperdiet. In tincidunt, enim sodales iaculis viverra, lorem mauris semper urna, et fringilla libero sapien nec libero.

item.title: Alishia Groove
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Ut molestie et lorem nec posuere. Morbi malesuada justo vel sem mollis, sit amet tempus arcu sodales. Sed viverra bibendum diam vel consectetur. Duis ut euismod mi. Sed suscipit, arcu sed aliquet congue.
